remarks: Variant on ~ strfv for large structures.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2017.)
statement:
strfv3.u $e |- ( ph -> U = S ) $.
strfv3.s $e |- S Struct X $.
strfv3.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
strfv3.n $e |- { <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. } C_ S $.
strfv3.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
strfv3.a $e |- A = ( E ` U ) $.
strfv3 $p |- ( ph -> A = C ) $.
